title: Portrait of Mrs. Charles Bolles Rogers
marks: Signature and date Signed LR: [Frances Cranmer Greenman 1925]
description: Portrait. Seated woman in red and black dress, red shoes, and matching headband/earrings. White dresser with flowers in upper right background.
creditline: Gift of Mr. Frederick Van Dusen Rogers, Mrs. Edward Pierson and Mrs. John Richard Savage.
